official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Transportation and the Commandant of the Coast Guard should promptly take all practicable action to fill all the 500 positions authorized in the Department of Defense Authorization Act, 1986, for Tactical Law Enforcement Teams.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Secretary of Transportation and the Commandant of the Coast Guard should fill all 500 positions authorized under the Department of Defense Authorization Act, 1986 for Tactical Law Enforcement Teams within a specified time.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Transportation and the Commandant of the Coast Guard should promptly take all practicable action to fill all the 500 positions authorized in the Department of Defense Authorization Act, 1986, for Tactical Law Enforcement Teams.
